text: atta, prayāṇikara ondu taṇḍavu bandu, tamagāgi nīru tumbuvātanannu (yūsuph‌rannu eseyalāgidda bāviya baḷige) kaḷisidaru. Avanu tanna koḍavannu iḷisidanu (mattu) ‘‘idō illide śubhavārte. Illobba bālakaniddāne’’ endu ghōṣisidanu. Taruvāya avaru avarannu (yūsuph‌rannu) vyāpārada sarakendu parigaṇisi aḍagisiṭṭaru. Avaru māḍuttidda ellavannū allāhanu aritiddanu
